ext_desc.message: A simple way to manage your browser extensions

group_fixed_desc.message: This is a built-in group where extensions within this group will not be disabled when manually switching groups in the Popup. Typically, permanent extensions are placed in this group. Note: If a specific extension is explicitly configured to be disabled in a rule configuration, it will still be disabled even if it is in the fixed group.

group_hidden_desc.message: This is a built-in group where extensions within this group will not be displayed in the popup.

group_inner_cannot_edit.message: The built-in group cannot be edited

group_inner_cannot_delete.message: The built-in group cannot be deleted

group_may_redundant_desc.message: This extension is already in a fixed group, the extension will always be activated when switching groups

about_desc.message: An extension that can automatically enable or disable browser extension based on rules

about_storage_usage.message: Browser sync storage usage: Profile($1), Group($2), Alias($3), Rule($4)

alias_max_length.message: The maximum length of an alias is 50 characters

alias_remark_max_length.message: The maximum length of a remark is 100 characters

rule_tip_no_set_time.message: [Action] Not set when enabling or disabling extensions

rule_tip_no_set_url_method_enable.message: [Action] (Enable Extension) Not set method for calculating URL matching

rule_tip_no_set_url_method_disable.message: [Action] (Disable Extension) Not set method for calculating URL matching

rule_set_time_of_enable.message: (Enable Extension) When enable the target extension

rule_set_time_of_disable.message: (Disable Extension) When disable the target extension

rule_set_url_not_match_method_enable.message: (Enable Extension) Way of URL does not match

rule_set_url_not_match_method_disable.message: (Disable Extension) Way of URL not match

rule_set_url_enable_current_match.message: Current Tab Match (The extension will be enabled only if the URL pattern matches the current tab)

rule_set_url_enable_any_match.message: Any Tab Match (The extension will be enabled if the URL pattern matches any tab)

rule_set_url_enable_current_not_match.message: Current Tab not Match (The extension will be enabled if the URL pattern does not match the current tab)

rule_set_url_enable_all_not_match.message: All Tab not Match (The extension will be enabled only if the URL pattern does not match any tab)

rule_set_url_disable_current_match.message: Current Tab Match (The extension will be disabled only if the URL pattern matches the current tab)

rule_set_url_disable_any_match.message: Any Tab Match (The extension will be disabled if the URL pattern matches any tab)

rule_set_url_disable_current_not_match.message: Current Tab not Match (The extension will be disabled if the URL pattern does not match the current tab)

rule_set_url_disable_all_not_match.message: All Tab not Match (The extension will be disabled only if the URL pattern does not match any tab)

rule_set_target_no_any_target.message: No extension or extension group was selected as the target

rule_set_match_at_least_one.message: [Matching Conditions] Please add at least one matching condition

rule_set_match_all.message: Match all of the following conditions

rule_set_match_any.message: Match any of the following conditions

rule_match_url_tip.message: URL matching is calculated based on the currently open browser tab by default. Switching tabs will cause the URL matching to change. For more matching options, you can configure them in the customization settings. (If there are no URL matching conditions, you don't need to worry about this issue.)

rule_action_close_when_match_desc.message: Disable When Matched: Automatically disable the extension when the conditions are met. (Will not be automatically enabled.)

rule_action_open_when_matched_desc.message: Enable When Matched: Automatically enable the extension when the conditions are met. (Will not be automatically Disabled.)

rule_action_close_only_when_matched_desc.message: Disable Only When Matched: Automatically disable when the conditions are met. Automatically enable when not met.

rule_action_open_only_when_matched_desc.message: Enable Only When Matched: Automatically enable when the conditions are met. Automatically disable when not met.

rule_action_custom_desc.message: Customize when to enable or disable the extension.

rule_action_none_desc.message: Do not automatically enable and disable extensions

rule_action_top_extension.message: Display extension at the top in the Popup

rule_action_auto_reload_when_enable.message: Reload the current tab after enabled

rule_action_auto_reload_when_disable.message: Reload the current tab after disabled

rule_edit_save_error_limit.message: Save failed, Exceeded the browser storage limit.

trigger_os_select_one.message: Select at least one operating system type.

trigger_os_select_tip.message: Select the operating system(s) to be matched, can select multiple options.

trigger_scene_select_one.message: Select Profile to be Matched, Can Select Multiple Profiles.

trigger_url_match_desc.message: The URL by default refers to the URL of the currently opened tab. More you can see detail.

trigger_url_use_full_desc.message: By default, the query parameters and anchor parts of the URL are not considered.

trigger_period_max.message: Set up to 10 time interval maximum

trigger_period_no_complete.message: No Start Time or End Time

trigger_period_cannot_greater.message: The start time cannot be greater than or equal to the end time

trigger_period_cannot_overlap.message: There is a time overlap in the intervals

trigger_period_action_desc.message: Due to browser restrictions, background operations cannot be persistent and must be triggered by events. Therefore, this condition can only be matched when the browser is active, and the timing may not be precise.

setting_clear_confirm_content.message: This operation will delete all data including settings, profiles, groups, aliases, rules, etc.

setting_ui_search_display.message: Search Box: Display by default (When not enabled, click üîç to display)

setting_ui_search_display_tip.message: You can also use the shortcut key 'F' to open the search box.

setting_ui_search_jump.message: Search Box: Supports jumping to the app store for search

setting_ui_search_jump_tip.message: When enabled, you can jump to the extension store to search (Quick jump with Enter)

setting_ui_show_app.message: Display extensions of the APP type

setting_ui_show_app_tip.message: Display extensions of the APP type at the bottom of the Popup. Clicking on the icon will directly launch the application.

setting_ui_show_fixed_extension.message: Display extensions of the fixed group

setting_ui_show_fixed_extension_tip.message: The extensions in the fixed group, are typically the resident extensions. If you don't want them to be displayed in the Popup list, you can disable this option.

setting_ui_show_fixed_dot.message: Display a small dot in the upper right corner of the fixed group extensions

setting_list_view_show_button.message: List View: Always display the shortcut action buttons (default is hover to display)

setting_list_gird_show_name_tip.message: If an alias for the extension is set, the alias will be displayed.

setting_list_gird_show_disable_gray.message: Grid View: Display disabled extensions in a grayed-out style

setting_list_gird_show_menu_right_click.message: Grid View: Display the operation menu by mouse right-click

setting_list_sort_type.message: Order: Sort the extensions based on their activation frequency

setting_func_witch_group.message: When switching groups, enable the extensions in the current group and disable the rest

setting_func_witch_group_tip.message: After enabling, when switching groups in the Popup, all extensions that are not in the fixed groups or the current group will be disabled.
